name: CoffinDrone and GraveRunner Play Together
description:
This game is a part of Dugin`s House Project

It is not a game but You can play it (really)

Main Keyboard shortcuts:

Down Arrow - change Character

Left/Right Arrows - Move Controls

E- Create End of Death Event

Additional Keyboard shortcuts:

P - Stop/Play Music

R - restart game

H - hide/unhide HUD

Num +/- - increase/dexrease sun speed

Num 5 - Freeze Time of a day

B - hide/show DroneCam1

V - hide/show DroneCam2
